title: What ever happened to the case where 5 or 6 Aferican Americans brutally murdered a Chineese food delivery man in June of last year?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20121229/ARTICLES/121229695 They still haven't come up for trial since we wrote this. When they day, the StarNews will cover the trial.
